title: A Free Service!
description: Community managers and recipients **never** get billed for any setup charges or recurring payments.

title: Audited & Well-Tested Smart Contracts
description: You can trust our open and battle-tested contracts to run your airdrops smoothly and effectively.

title: A Freer And Fairer System
description: EthDrop has the power to increase everone's income! This can help shrink wage gaps, make everyone a bit richer, and dramatically help those in poverty.
